text:
Hi Lousie, 
I'm sorry it been awhile! I currently in my final year of university. However, I was wondering if you possibly had any feedback from the portfolio I sent a couple of months ago :slightly_smiling_face:

Oh also, for my dissertation we have to write   about the industry we wish to get into and contact professionals working in that field. I was wondering it it be possible to ask you a couple of questions and use it in the dissertation  with your wirtten consent if this is possible :slightly_smiling_face: if not i completely understand. 

Mnay thanks 
Samantha!

Hi Sam! Aside from checking your formatting and spelling I think your portfolio looked good, do you have a showreel as well? If you want to look into anim or previz roles they would usually like to see a showreel. I am more than happy to help answer questions for your dissertation.
